message.body: Hi! Did you give the sofa away?
Julia would like to see it, if possible, whenever you're around.
I did not yet. Would you like it??
Sure! I should be by at some point today. I can also leave the door open since there's nothing in there! I'll let you know!
Hi! Would you be able to tell me the length measurement of at least one window in the living room of apt? Thank you.
Hi Nellie! I left the apartment but the door is open! Feel free to go on in and measure anything you need!
